ygData.subject: Re: re some stuff :)
ygData.msgSnippet: pets not allowed in duels is a bug, and will hopefully be fixed sometime soon. They are allowed in duels for +pvp players. Morgul ... From: Grant Vanderhule
ygData.messageBody:
pets not allowed in duels is a bug, and will hopefully be fixed sometime
soon. They are allowed in duels for +pvp players.
Morgul
----- Original Message -----
From: Grant Vanderhule <vandergm@...>
To: <shadowknight@onelist.com>
Sent: Sunday, May 16, 1999 4:19 PM
Subject: [shadowknight] re some stuff :)


> From: Grant Vanderhule <vandergm@...>
>
> ok, the lvl 15 pet does not have magical attacks. it can bash however.
> if you shadow step, your pet will not commit suicide, it'll just either
run
> to you, stay there, or keep fighting, depending on what you'd been having
it do.
> pets are NOT allowed in duels. however, they may be allowed in guild
wars..
> they would make for some interesting strategies too :) to be absolutely
sure
> you'd have to ask someone on rallos, which is set up more or less like
> permanent guild war for everybody :)
>
> the dark elf npcs in the commonlands (dragoon zytl and kizdean gix) are
not
> KoS to human shadowknights. but they dont like us THAT much, so try to
keep
> your faction standings with the dark elves up.
>
> Beld Demonblade
> Fennin Ro
>
>
